<<<<<<< HEAD
The poem of poems. Or, Sions muse contayning the diuine song of King Salomon, deuided into eight eclogues. Poem of poems. Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.
[70] p.
Printed by Iames Roberts for Mathew Lownes, and are to be solde at his shop in Saint Dunstones Church, At London : [1596]
Dedication signed: I.M. [i.e. Gervase Markham]. Partly in verse. Signatures: A-D E⁴ (-A1). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Printed by Iames Roberts for Mathew Lownes, and are to be solde at his shop in Saint Dunstones Church, At London : [1596]
Dedication signed: I.M. [i.e. Gervase Markham]. Partly in verse. Signatures: A-D E⁴ (-A1). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

his shop in Saint Dunstones Church
